LanguageData.Beauty.label: beauty
LanguageData.Beauty.description: How enjoyable an object is to look at.\n\nBeautiful objects fulfill characters' need for beauty.
LanguageData.BeautyOutdoors.label: outdoor beauty
LanguageData.BeautyOutdoors.description: How enjoyable something is to look at if it's outside.\n\nBeautiful objects fulfill peoples' need for beauty.
LanguageData.Cleanliness.label: cleanliness
LanguageData.Cleanliness.description: How much an object contributes to an area's cleanliness score.
LanguageData.Comfort.label: comfort
LanguageData.Comfort.description: How comfortable an object is to sit or lay on.\n\nUsing comfortable objects fulfills a character's need for comfort.
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate.label: deterioration rate
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate.description: The rate at which this item deteriorates when left outside, in average hit points per day.\n\nDeterioration rate is also affected by things like weather, roofs, toxic fallout, or being left in shallow water.
LanguageData.Flammability.label: flammability
LanguageData.Flammability.description: How easily an object catches fire and how quickly a fire will grow as it burns.
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChanceFixedHuman.label: food poison chance
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChanceFixedHuman.description: The chance this food will cause food poisoning.
LanguageData.MarketValue.label: market value
LanguageData.MarketValue.description: The market value of an object.\n\nThe actual trade price will be adjusted by negotiation skill, relationship status, and other contextual factors.
LanguageData.MarketValueIgnoreHp.label: market value ignoring hitpoints
LanguageData.Mass.label: mass
LanguageData.Mass.description: The physical mass of an object.
LanguageData.MaxHitPoints.label: max hit points
LanguageData.MaxHitPoints.description: The maximum hit points of an object.\n\nThis represents how much damage it can take before being destroyed.
LanguageData.Nutrition.label: nutrition
LanguageData.RoyalFavorValue.label: honor value
LanguageData.RoyalFavorValue.description: The amount of honor your trader will earn for giving this to a tribute collector.
LanguageData.SellPriceFactor.label: sell price multiplier
LanguageData.SellPriceFactor.description: A multiplier on the price at which you can sell items.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyTurret.label: shooting accuracy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyTurret.description: Base chance to not miss per cell of shot distance.\n\nChance to hit is also affected by many other factors. A hit chance explanation for any shot can be seen by selecting a shooter and mousing over a target.
LanguageData.WorkToMake.label: work to make
LanguageData.WorkToMake.description: The base amount of work it takes to make an item, once all materials are gathered.
